body_html:
Oh, it seems I forgot to provide more information about my current TF build and hardware config.

TF: built from commit c7b80d51da4fb6d51ea54a0bdf2601afa379d60c with CUDA support but it still repros if I use the normal pip version.

Oh, it seems I forgot to provide more information about my current TF build and hardware config.

TF: built from commit [c7b80d51da4fb6d51ea54a0bdf2601afa379d60c](c7b80d51da4fb6d51ea54a0bdf2601afa379d60c) with CUDA support but it still repros if I use the normal pip version.
